packageJson.name: component-page-creator
packageJson.description: An internal Gatsby plugin that creates pages from component files in src/pages
packageJson.author: Kyle Mathews <mathews.kyle@gmail.com>

packageJson.name: component-layout-creator
packageJson.description: An internal Gatsby plugin that creates pages from component files in src/layouts
packageJson.author: Kyle Mathews <mathews.kyle@gmail.com>

packageJson.name: internal-data-bridge
packageJson.description: An internal Gatsby plugin which creates data nodes from internal data
packageJson.author: Kyle Mathews <mathews.kyle@gmail.com>

packageJson.name: dev-404-page
packageJson.description: Internal plugin to add a 404 page in development with helpful information
packageJson.author: Kyle Mathews <mathews.kyle@gmail.com>

packageJson.name: prod-404
packageJson.description: Internal plugin to detect various flavors of 404 pages and ensure there's a 404.html path created as well to ensure compatability with static hosts
packageJson.author: Kyle Mathews <mathews.kyle@gmail.com>

packageJson.name: query-runner
packageJson.description: Internal plugin for running queries

packageJson.name: gatsby-source-filesystem
packageJson.description: Gatsby plugin which parses files within a directory for further parsing by other plugins
packageJson.author: Kyle Mathews <mathews.kyle@gmail.com>

packageJson.name: gatsby-plugin-feed
packageJson.description: Creates an RSS feed for your Gatsby site.
packageJson.author: Nicholas Young <nicholas@nicholaswyoung.com>

packageJson.name: gatsby-transformer-remark
packageJson.description: Gatsby transformer plugin for Markdown using the Remark library and ecosystem
packageJson.author: Kyle Mathews <mathews.kyle@gmail.com>

packageJson.name: gatsby-remark-images
packageJson.description: Processes images in markdown so they can be used in the production build.
packageJson.author: Kyle Mathews <mathews.kyle@gmail.com>

packageJson.name: gatsby-remark-responsive-iframe
packageJson.description: Make iframes in Markdown processed by Remark responsive
packageJson.author: Kyle Mathews <mathews.kyle@gmail.com>

packageJson.name: gatsby-remark-prismjs
packageJson.description: Adds syntax highlighting to code blocks at build time using PrismJS
packageJson.author: Kyle Mathews <mathews.kyle@gmail.com>

packageJson.name: gatsby-remark-copy-linked-files
packageJson.description: Find files which are linked to from markdown and copy them to the public directory
packageJson.author: Kyle Mathews <mathews.kyle@gmail.com>

packageJson.name: gatsby-remark-smartypants
packageJson.description: Use retext-smartypants to auto-enhance typography of markdown
packageJson.author: Kyle Mathews <mathews.kyle@gmail.com>

packageJson.name: gatsby-transformer-sharp
packageJson.description: Gatsby transformer plugin for images using Sharp
packageJson.author: Kyle Mathews <mathews.kyle@gmail.com>

packageJson.name: gatsby-plugin-sharp
packageJson.description: Wrapper of the Sharp image manipulation library for Gatsby plugins
packageJson.author: Kyle Mathews <mathews.kyle@gmail.com>

packageJson.name: gatsby-plugin-google-analytics
packageJson.description: Gatsby plugin to add google analytics onto a site
packageJson.author: Kyle Mathews <mathews.kyle@gmail.com>

packageJson.name: gatsby-plugin-sitemap
packageJson.description: Stub description for gatsby-plugin-sitemap
packageJson.author: Nicholas Young <nicholas@nicholaswyoung.com>

packageJson.name: gatsby-plugin-offline
packageJson.description: Gatsby plugin which sets up a site to be able to run offline
packageJson.author: Kyle Mathews <mathews.kyle@gmail.com>

packageJson.name: gatsby-plugin-catch-links
packageJson.description: Intercepts local links from markdown and other non-react pages and does a client-side pushState to avoid the browser having to refresh the page.
packageJson.author: Kyle Mathews <mathews.kyle@gmail.com>

packageJson.name: gatsby-plugin-react-helmet
packageJson.description: Stub description for gatsby-plugin-react-helmet
packageJson.author: Kyle Mathews <mathews.kyle@gmail.com>

packageJson.name: gatsby-plugin-postcss-sass
packageJson.description: Gatsby plugin to handle scss/sass files with integrated support for also processing with Postcss plugins
packageJson.author: Scotty Eckenthal <scotty@meetfabric.com>

packageJson.name: gatsby-starter-lumen
packageJson.description: Simple starter for Gatsby
packageJson.author: Alexander Shelepenok <alxshelepenok@gmail.com>

siteMetadata.title: Blog by youth.Wang
siteMetadata.subtitle: All is my dream,All is life !

internal.content:
---
title: "About me"
layout: page
path: "/about"
---

Wang wei, now living in wuhan, wuhan zhongsoft tong card information technology co., LTD., is a front-end web engineer who firmly believes that some of them are life, and all of life is a dream.

![From the basic web page jquery development web page, to the single-page application of the development, to the now very enthusiastic reaction -native development.](./1.jpg)

*From the basic web page jquery development web page, to the single-page application of the development, to the now very enthusiastic reaction -native development.*

Love the code of the program, constantly strive for the quality of life and life attitude towards the leading edge technology, like life, enjoy reading time.

Development of APP: post-car service management software - business opportunity management; Network equipment management system -wifi hacking;

---
title: "Contact me"
layout: page
path: "/contact"
---
